subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Against Kentucky on Saturday, Louisville Coach Rick Pitino can dust off his slingshot and try to topple a Goliath, as if it were the 1987 Final Four again and he was still at Providence.
snippet: Against Kentucky on Saturday, Louisville Coach Rick Pitino can dust off his slingshot and try to topple a Goliath, as if it were the 1987 Final Four again and he was still at Providence.
